title: Elon Musk Eyes Tesla Staff Cuts; CEO's plan to shed around 10% of salaried employees draws response from President Biden
text:
The latest message about the potential job cuts appeared to clarify one Mr. Musk sent late Thursday, and earlier reported by Reuters, in which he linked staff reductions to what he called a "super bad feeling" about the economy.

Tesla didn't immediately respond to a request for comment.

Tesla shares slumped more than 8% Friday.

President Biden, asked about Mr. Musk's statement about plans to lay off employees and the CEO's wider concerns about the economy, pointed to recent announcements by Ford Motor Co. and Intel Corp. to add to their workforce. "You know, lots of luck on his trip to the moon," Mr. Biden said of Mr. Musk.

Mr. Musk shortly after tweeted an artist's rendering of a SpaceX rocketon the Moon, adding, "Thanks Mr President!"

Elon Musk Eyes Tesla Staff Cuts
